definition: from time to time/now and then/occasionally/frequently
a possible period of want or need

sentences.english: While reluctant to criticize the status quo, the guides often let things slip out in conversation.
sentences.chinese: 導遊不願意批評現狀，但在交談中會不時漏嘴。

sentences.english: At intervals formal receptions were held at the governor's mansion.
sentences.chinese: 總督府中不時舉行正式酒會。

sentences.english: Tally your accomplishments, and make your boss aware of them on a regularbasis.
sentences.chinese: 記錄你的工作成果，並不時讓你的老闆知道你的努力。

sentences.english: Localised epidemics and global pandemics periodically pose a significant national and global threat.
sentences.chinese: 局部和全球的的流行病時不時的威脅着我們。

sentences.english: Pardon me, hounded hope, for laughing from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 被追獵的希望啊，原諒我不時大笑。

sentences.english: He was like a taut string; you can play the notes from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 他像是一根繃緊的弦，時不時可以彈奏出音符。

sentences.english: they're not making direct eye-contact, they're looking at their watch.
sentences.chinese: 他們避免跟你的眼神交流，不時地看看錶。

sentences.english: In the comic dialogue, two performers revealed the joke suddenly, which made the audience convulse with laughter.
sentences.chinese: 相聲演員不時抖包袱，令現場觀衆捧腹大笑。

sentences.english: I often come out , stamp of stamp one's foot, can be frozen stiff really otherwise.
sentences.chinese: 我不時出來走走，跺跺腳，否則真會被凍僵。

sentences.english: He glanced repeatedly at his watch.
sentences.chinese: 他不時對手錶瞥上一眼。

sentences.english: In the scene turns the large flame often gushes out to the window outside.
sentences.chinese: 火場內翻起的火舌不時地向窗外湧出。

sentences.english: He was utterly rigid except for his hands, which were opening and closing spasmodically.
sentences.chinese: 現在，他完全僵硬了，除了手掌時不時一開一合。

sentences.english: He punctuated his remarks with thumps on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他講話時不時地捶着桌子。

sentences.english: On the grass, grasshoppers singing near by them with gi gi zi zi .
sentences.chinese: 草地上，唧唧織織的草蜢不時在旁和聲高唱。

sentences.english: A few children buy game currency from time to time in devoted machine.
sentences.chinese: 一些孩子時不時地買來遊戲幣投入機器中。

sentences.english: Lost pendant BaiXi bad words after the start time, BaiXi suspicious huimei.
sentences.chinese: 丟了吊墜後的白熙壞音訊不時，白熙開端疑心惠美。

definition: at any time/at all times/at the right time
one side/either side/on the one hand/on the other hand/doing while
all over the place/everywhere and all directions
to seize an opportunity/to take advantage of situation
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
